import React, { useContext } from 'react' import { TaskListContext } from '../contexts/TaskListContext' import axios from "axios" const Task = ({ task }) => { const { removeTask, findItem } = useContext(TaskListContext) axios.delete(`http://localhost:22000/user/${task.id}`) return (
  • {task.nom} {task.prenoms} {task.job}
    • ) } export default Task
